bioghist.p: The Jeanne Ruddy Dance company was created and is directed by Jeanne Ruddy, former principal dancer with the Martha Graham Company. In June 2000, Jeanne Ruddy Dance had its first season at The Wilma Theatre in Philadelphia, presenting two world premieres by Jeanne Ruddy and guest choreographer, Mark Dendy, along with guest artists Terese Capucilli, Donlin Foreman and Leslie Carothers.

scopecontent.p: This is a small collection of materials of the Jeanne Ruddy Dance Company. Materials include programs and brochures; videos of the performances from the 2001 and 2003 seasons; newspaper articles about the company; and a poster from the 2003 season.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
